title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, and embed with local models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface). Runs in Docker or pip.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with Android support and reactive streams.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that proxies to Ollama with streaming support.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component to chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma in ~100 lines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that calls Ollama locally; supports slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with async/await and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK for Ollama with .NET 6+ and async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app exposing Ollama as a REST chat endpoint with token-rate limits.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama models into channels via socket mode.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run Ollama prompts inside notes and insert completions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer pooling and Telemetry events.
